title: Crowds gather in London for ‘unite the kingdom’ march featuring Tommy Robinson – UK politics live
summary: March is set to witness Britain's largest far-right rally in decades, featuring speakers from the UK, the US, and Europe. The event is anticipated to draw significant attention and concern from various groups. Authorities are likely to prepare for potential disruptions and backlash against the rally.

title: World Athletics Championships: big names and Brits impress in women’s 100m heats, women’s 10,000m final and more – live
summary: John Brewin is providing live updates from the first evening session in Tokyo. The report covers key developments and highlights as they unfold. Stay tuned for real-time insights and analysis.

title: Brisbane v Gold Coast: AFL 2025 second semi-final – live
summary: The Lions face off against the Suns at the Gabba for a spot in the preliminary final against Collingwood. Follow Geoff Lemon for live updates on the match. The game promises exciting moments as both teams compete for a chance to advance.

title: Premier League returns with Postecoglou taking Nottingham Forest to Arsenal – matchday live
summary: Tom Bassam highlights the excitement surrounding the upcoming Premier League match, as Arsenal prepares to host Nottingham Forest in the lunchtime kick-off. Fans are eager for the season's return. The match promises to be a thrilling start to the weekend's football action.

title: New Zealand v South Africa: Women’s Rugby World Cup quarter-final – live
summary: Daniel Gallan provides live updates as the defending champions face South Africa at Sany Park. Stay tuned for minute-by-minute coverage of the match. Follow along for key moments and developments.
